short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice Signature 2FA - Pioneering Secure Authentication with Personalized Voice Recognition.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Sesme introduces Voice Signature 2FA, setting a new standard for secure authentication with personalized voice recognition technology.
